nodes.text: Zera was a female Human citizen of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. She served in ranks of the Knights of Zakuul and was a partner of the Knight-Captain Senya Tirall, who had saved Zera's life countless time over the years. Fiercely devoted to Senya, Zera was asked by her partner to defect and join the Alliance during the war against Zakuul.

Zera appears during "The Nathema Conspiracy" flashpoint only if the player made the Dark Side choice to kill Senya Tirall during Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne. In this case, Zera will seek revenge on the Commander and join the Order of Zildrog led by Vinn Atrius, only to be sacrificed as fuel to awaken Zildrog by GEMINI 16 on Nathema. If the player makes the Light Side choice, Senya remains alive and Zera has no reason to seek revenge, being replaced by Chela Nayss instead.
